de.lessvoid.math

Class Vec3

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.math.Vec3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Vec3
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a 3-tuple vector.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Id$
    Author:
    cix_foo , void256 - removed the interfaces this class implements and remove the base class to make that a simple and plain self-contained class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Add a vector to another vector and place the result in a destination vector.

        left - The LHS vector
        right - The RHS vector
